      • getSurface

        public ArrayList<ArrayList<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D>> getSurface()
        Description copied from class: AbstractSurface
        Retrieve the last surface generated.
        Specified by:
        getSurface in class AbstractSurface
        Returns:
        the last surface generated. If no surface was ever generated returns an empty ArrayList<ArrayList<Vector3D>>.

      • generateSurface

        public void generateSurface(ArrayList<ArrayList<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D>> Heightfield,
                            int smoothFactor)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSurface
        Generate a surface S(u,v).
        Specified by:
        generateSurface in class AbstractSurface
        Parameters:
        Heightfield - the height field of control points.
        smoothFactor - relates to either the number of iterations to perform the smooth algorithm or to the amount of extra points required to generate.
